participant_1.name: Samira
participant_1.personality: Creative, adventurous, and a bit eccentric.
participant_1.background: I once convinced a police officer that my skunk was a service animal so he'd let me go. I have the gene that lets me know when someone's eaten asparagus. I remember listening to Tupac Shakur in the back seat of my parents' car when I was a kid. I love celebrating Diwali with my family. I am a drummer in an indie band.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.background: I'm single, and I'm quite content with being on my own. I sometimes burn myself while welding because I get too focused on the work and forget to take precautions. I play the violin to help provide for my family. I am a well-educated person who enjoys bowling and music. I'm pursuing my law degree.

content.text: Pretty good! I got to play some violin today.
Oh wow that's awesome. I once convinced a police officer that my skunk was a service animal so he'd let me go.
That's so funny! I've never heard of that before.
Yeah it was pretty crazy. He was really confused when I told him that.
I bet he was! I'm glad it worked out for you though.
Thanks me too! What are you studying in school?
I'm studying law. I want to be a lawyer when I graduate.
Oh wow that's really cool! I'm sure you'll be a great lawyer.
Thanks! I hope so. I'm excited to start my career.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great things.
